title: Jotham’s Faithful Rule
summary: Jotham, Uzziah’s son, reigns faithfully without entering the temple improperly. He strengthens Judah through construction and military victories. The people, however, continue in corrupt practices.

faq.question: How did Jotham lead?
faq.answer: He lived righteously and strengthened the nation through building projects and military success.

faq.question: What limitation is mentioned during his reign?
faq.answer: Though he was faithful, the people continued to act corruptly.
